name: Happy Little Tree
description:
Each time you refresh, a new bonsai awaits you!

If you aren't happy with your tree, simply reload the page~

Use your mouse to manipulate the noodly trees, move rocks and decorations around, and even landscape your little pond.

Soon I will put in features that allow you to add and remove rocks, and some new decorations~

Enjoy and relax!

If you liked this, you might also like Plim ~

Made for #procjam 2015, using paper.js
